descriptor: Susan and Carol announce to R that they are getting married
J talks about his dream last night
M is invited to the wedding
the guys are watching the movie scene in which J plays
C and R are about to come out
Pb tells them a client died on her massage table
Ra is nervous because her mother is visiting her
Her mother enters the cafe and Ra introduces her to her friends
Ra's mother tells her that she wants to leave her father
M arrives at her house and asks Ra and her mother if the title of her cake sounds good
Ra demands an explanation from her mother
Ra confides in the guys about her parents' divorce and her mother's behavior
